component.name: Lychee Slicer
component.summary: A powerful and versatile Slicer for Resin and Filament 3D Printers

description.p: With Lychee Slicer, you get the best companion to prepare 3D models for your Resin and Filament 3D Printers. Get access to many features to create a tailored and smooth workflow that fits your needs! Lychee Slicer is easy to use and provides powerful tools in an elegant and intuitive interface. Always be at the edge of 3D Printing with Lychee Slicer!
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Mango3D

ul.li: Fixed a critical bug that could corrupt scenes during certain geometry operations.

Fixed broken Documentation Links - Several in-app links (e.g., general info, CTBV4 format, object notes, hollow blockers, late supports, community profile, exportable holes, and batch tools) were leading to 404 errors. They now correctly point to the right documentation pages.
Fixed incorrect Z Height for YMD Falcon Pro: the printer's Z value was incorrect—now set to the right size for accurate slicing.
Fixed default Resin Profile Exposure Time on Voxelab Polaris The exposure time in the default resin profile was off.
Fixed a critical bug that could corrupt scenes during certain geometry operations.
CTRL + Shift + E Shortcut – The "Export Selected Object" shortcut now works as expected.
Saving Empty Scenes – Previously, attempting to save an empty scene was impossible. This has been fixed.
Transparent Navigation Tabs – The Resin and Filament menus no longer appear transparent when returning from Preferences.
External Drive Saving – On Windows, scene files (.lys) can now be saved at the root of a drive.
Shift + Drag Select for Supports – Selecting supports with SHIFT + drag now works consistently without deselecting other supports.
Reload Last Scene Dialog Checkbox – The “Do not show again” checkbox now properly prevents the dialog from reappearing.
Creality Halot One Screen Ratio – Corrected the height/width ratio in sliced files for the Creality Halot One, causing UVTools to alert on an incorrect ratio.
Hole Editing & Wi-Fi Printer Reset – Gizmo no longer resets when using advanced features (planar cut, hole advanced mode) with a Wi-Fi printer connected.
Files Not Opening in Recent Versions – Fixed a bug causing some files from older versions to take a long time to open on recent versions, which worked fine in 5.2.
Mac OS Sonoma compatibility, including the fix of the suction cup detector and island detection features.
The Island Detector not showing islands on objects has been fixed.
Supports created through the Magic tool no longer go through the model raft.
Advertising issues that reload while using Wifi export has been fixed.
Support painting first support was using the expected preset, but not following supports. It has been fixed.
Better detection of mouse/cursor position when click and dragging supports.
Wi-Fi support for 3D Printers equipped with Chitubox mainboard (ApexMaker x1, Elegoo Saturn 3 Ultra, Elegoo Mars 4 Ultra)
Optional and skippable ads when Slicing for Pro users (related to 3D Printing)
Fix start gcode of Sovol SV07 and SV07 Plus
